alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 10:16AM CST until January 05 at 10:20AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several roads near Wilhelmina, Missouri are flooded. Recreational areas and large areas of agricultural land near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 15.5 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
